summary: Modify auto top up option one config
description: Modify auto top up option one config.1. each country has differect tax rate 2. we have minimum and maximam top-up amount limitation.For SG, min=5, max = 8,333,333,330;for PH, min=100,Max=17,895,600;for TH, min=100,max=8,333,333,300;for VN, min=50,000,max=833,333,300,000;for MY,min=10,max=8,333,333,330;for ID,min=25,000,max=8,333,333,000.the api timeout is 3s, max qps is 100, make sure do not over these num, especially qps, otherwise you may be blacklisted or limited request count for a while.

query.name: limitAmount
query.description: If balance is lower than this value, auto topUp operation will be done.

query.name: topupAmount
query.description: The amount of topUp for each auto topUp.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/sponsor/solutions/wallet/modifyAutoTopUpOptionOneConfig')
request.add_api_parameter("status", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("limitAmount", "1000")
request.add_api_parameter("topupAmount", "1000")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/sponsor/solutions/wallet/modifyAutoTopUpOptionOneConfig')
request.add_api_param('status', '1')
request.add_api_param('limitAmount', '1000')
request.add_api_param('topupAmount', '1000')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
